MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G42 postcode area of Glasgow. It will necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1AM to remove our generator and restore power to full mains supply. and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This 11.59PM on 15th December 2020.
